caption: Model Inference Activity
description: Captures fine-grained telemetry for AI model inference operations.
name: model_inference_activity

uid.description: Unique identifier for the inference request or job execution.

model_task_type.description: Type of ML task performed by the model (e.g., text-generation, classification, image-segmentation).

inference_trigger_type.description: How the inference was triggered (scheduled, user, agent, API).

input_type.description: Data type of the input provided (e.g., text, image, audio).

output_format.description: Format of the output produced (json, html, plain_text, etc.).

input_size_bytes.description: Size of the input in bytes. Useful for tracking performance and scale.

output_size_bytes.description: Size of the output in bytes.

runtime_framework.description: ML framework or runtime used (torch, tensorflow, onnx, triton).

batch_id.description: ID for a batch of inference requests, if batched.

batch_position.description: Position of this inference within the batch (0-indexed).

audit_log_reference.description: Link or ID to the audit log entry for this inference, for traceability.

detected_anomalies.description: List of anomalies observed (e.g., null_output, high_latency, low_confidence).
